column4: How do i patch a file, i have .patch file, but do not know what command to issue ????

Hi, i use fluxbox as window manager on edgy, the screen resolution keeps getting back to default and does not stay at what i change it to using gnome-control-center every time i restart. How do i change it so that it stays permanent ?
Hi guys, suggest a similar player to XMMS or better  ...... :)
